- (id EC2ModifyImageAttributeRequest.)init  

Default constructor for a new ModifyImageAttributeRequest object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

- (id EC2ModifyImageAttributeRequest.)initWithImageId: (NSString *)  theImageId
andAttribute: (NSString *)  theAttribute 

Constructs a new ModifyImageAttributeRequest object.

Callers should use properties to initialize any additional object members.

Parameters:
theImageId The ID of the AMI whose attribute you want to modify.
theAttribute The name of the AMI attribute you want to modify.

Available attributes: launchPermission, productCodes

Property Documentation

- (NSString *) attribute [read, write, retain]

The name of the AMI attribute you want to modify.

Available attributes: launchPermission, productCodes

- (NSString *) operationType [read, write, retain]

The type of operation being requested.

Available operation types: add, remove

- (NSMutableArray *) productCodes [read, write, retain]

The list of product codes being added to or removed from the specified AMI.

Only valid when the productCodes attribute is being modified.

- (NSMutableArray *) userGroups [read, write, retain]

The user group being added to or removed from the list of user groups with launch permissions for this AMI.

Only valid when the launchPermission attribute is being modified.

Available user groups: all

- (NSMutableArray *) userIds [read, write, retain]

The AWS user ID being added to or removed from the list of users with launch permissions for this AMI.

Only valid when the launchPermission attribute is being modified.

- (NSString *) value [read, write, retain]

The value of the attribute being modified.

Only valid when the description attribute is being modified.
